mapper.update: update t_statistic_index_echart_data set time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, time_type = #{timeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, new_financial_members_count = #{newFinancialMembersCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, new_register_members_count = #{newRegisterMembersCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, invest_money = #{investMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, recharge_money = #{rechargeMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, time, time_type, new_financial_members_count, new_register_members_count, invest_money, recharge_money, type from t_statistic_index_echart_data where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
